section.title: Summary of Changes in SimpleCA
section.para: The Globus Toolkit version version of SimpleCA significantly changes the procedure for creating and distributing CA packages. In particular, the GPT setup package method of creating a package is removed. In its place are the and tools.

This version also provides native RPM and Debian packages for a range of Linux systems, as well as support for creating native packages from CA configuration files to make it easier to manage a distribution of CAs.
